title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' [2031]. The bug is observed in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. When selecting xxx as the destination, the software behavior is not in line with the expected behavior.
OB: The software behavior of the 'copy package' feature in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui is not as expected when selecting xxx as the destination.
EB: The 'copy package' feature in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui should be selecting org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui as the destination instead of xxx.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
2. Select 'copy package'.
3. Choose xxx as the destination.
